Files & Folders

what are files?

Home

When we save something onto a computer, we save it into a file. A file is something that contains data, and is opened with a computer program, or app, that shows us the contents of that file. There are different types of files such as images, documents, videos, and audio.

Files usually have an icon that makes them easy to recognise. Move your mouse over the icons below to find out more about them. When you're ready to move on, click next.
